entry.title: How to Officially Submit Your Emoji Idea
entry.quote: If you’ve ever had an idea for a new emoji bouncing around in your head, now’s your chance.

entry.title: Gen Z does not dream of labor
entry.quote: On TikTok and online, the youngest workers are rejecting work as we know it. How will that play out IRL?

entry.title: Autocorrect Explained: Why Your iPhone Adds Annoying Typos While Fixing Others
entry.quote: Tpying truble? During the iPhone’s first 15 years, its keyboard software has evolved, but it still sometimes flubs your lines. Here’s how it works and what you can do about it.

entry.title: 2022 Mac Studio (20-core M1 Ultra) Review
entry.quote: All of a sudden the previously generous upper limit of 100 GFlops on the vertical axis, which all the machines labored towards with diminishing returns, is not even remotely suitable. Performance of the Mac Studio is actually off the chart here.
